en.title: FusionExcel Donates VND 50 Million (RM 10,000) To Children With Innate Heart Diseases, South Vietnam!
en.content:
REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTORS PAUL & DORIS LEE.

With FE's vision of social entrepreneurship & Hope for Children Charity program, FE Founder Director, Mr. K S Lee presented a mock cheque donation of VND 50 Million (RM 10,000) to Retired General Le Thanh Hai, Chairman of Ho Chi Minh City Sponsorial Association For Poor Patients together with a presentation of 60 Quantum Pendants for them to kick start the Social Entrepreneurship for Children with Innate Heart Diseases, South Vietnam.

meta.description: FusionExcel donates VND 50 Million (RM 10,000) To Children with Innate Heart Diseases, South Vietnam to kick start the Social Entrepreneurship.
meta.keyword: Social entrepreneurship, Children Charity program, Le Thanh Hai, South Vietnam, Mr KS Lee
meta.author: klhunter
